arts.ttl: Everton v West Ham United | Starting XI revealed for Nuno’s first game
arts.sum: At last West Ham United fans have a match to look forward to – the away fixture against Everton had been earmarked as ‘one to bear through gritted teeth’ until Graham Potter was surprisingly sacked at the weekend and Nuno Espírito Santo appointed in his stead. The newly installed Portuguese Hammers coach now has to […] Source

arts.ttl: MNF: Fullkrug starts Nuno's first West Ham game at Everton LIVE!
arts.sum: There is a wonderful irony that Nuno's first game as West Ham boss is against Everton and more pertinently David Moyes - arguably the last stable Hammers boss before 12 months of instability. On Friday, you had Graham Potter announcing his plans to face Everton tonight in a press conference.

arts.ttl: West Ham United XI vs Everton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: A new era begins for West Ham United on Monday night as Nuno Espírito Santo takes charge of his first match away at Everton. The Portuguese manager was appointed on Saturday morning following the dramatic sacking of Graham Potter, with the club sitting 19th in the Premier League table. arts.ttl: Everton vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton welcome West Ham to their new Hill Dickinson Stadium fortress on Monday, aiming to bounce back from a disappointing week.
